Keywords: Avengers , Soldier
Real Name: Steve Rogers
Special Powers
RECRUITER: POWER: Choose a character with the Avengers keyword in your KO area that hasn't been chosen for or generated by a Recruiter effect. If you do, generate a character with the Avengers keyword from your Sideline that has a lower point value than the chosen character. This game, the generated character can't be replaced and your opponent scores them immediately instead of when they're KO'd.
AVENGERS ASSEMBLE!: Leadership. If Captain America is on an Avengers themed team, increase his Leadership result by 1.

Disasstah
Not so much a competitive piece since the recruiter trait gives up so many points, casually though this one will be fun.
January 18, 2022
Goop
Seems like the kind of piece you carry around for the 50/50 leadership and recruiter ability. Not sure if you really want to make him a main attacker with no real attack/dmg powers and weak defense. He's a guy you keep in the back. Alright for his points.
